description: React component for managing learning paths, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting paths. Uses hooks like useState, useEffect, and useMemo, and interacts with authoringService for backend API calls.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of paths from the backend and updates state.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input changes for the form fields.

methods.name: resetForm
methods.description: Resets the form to initial empty state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a path.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Populates the form with selected path data for editing.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specified path by ID.
